00030 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( DataSetHeaderUpdaterTest );
00031 
00032 #define TEST_FILE "data_file.quantification_updater_test"
00033 
00034 void DataSetHeaderUpdaterTest::setUp()
00035 {
00036 }
00037 
00038 void DataSetHeaderUpdaterTest::CreateReferenceQDFile()
00039 {
00040         CHPQuantificationDetectionData data(TEST_FILE);
00041         data.SetEntryCount(4, 10);
00042 
00043     ParameterNameValueType p;
00044     p.SetName(L"affymetrix-dataset-md5");
00045     p.SetValueAscii("", 128);
00046     data.GetDataSetHeader().AddNameValParam(p);
00047     p.SetName(L"other-param");
00048     p.SetValueAscii("", 128);
00049     data.GetDataSetHeader().AddNameValParam(p);
00050 
00051         CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter *writer = new CHPQuantificationDetectionFileWriter(data);
00052         ProbeSetQuantificationDetectionData e;
00053 
00054         writer->SeekToDataSet();
00055         e.name = "1";
00056         e.quantification = 10.0f;
00057     e.pvalue = 0.1f;
00058         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00059         e.name = "2";
00060         e.quantification = 20.0f;
00061     e.pvalue = 0.2f;
00062         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00063         e.name = "3";
00064         e.quantification = 30.0f;
00065     e.pvalue = 0.3f;
00066         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00067         e.name = "4";
00068         e.quantification = 40.0f;
00069     e.pvalue = 0.4f;
00070         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00071 
00072         delete writer;
00073 }
00074 
00075 void DataSetHeaderUpdaterTest::CreateReferenceQFile()
00076 {
00077         CHPQuantificationData data(TEST_FILE);
00078         data.SetEntryCount(4, 10);
00079 
00080     ParameterNameValueType p;
00081     p.SetName(L"affymetrix-dataset-md5");
00082     p.SetValueAscii("", 128);
00083     data.GetDataSetHeader().AddNameValParam(p);
00084     p.SetName(L"other-param");
00085     p.SetValueAscii("", 128);
00086     data.GetDataSetHeader().AddNameValParam(p);
00087 
00088         CHPQuantificationFileWriter *writer = new CHPQuantificationFileWriter(data);
00089         ProbeSetQuantificationData e;
00090 
00091         writer->SeekToDataSet();
00092         e.name = "1";
00093         e.quantification = 10.0f;
00094         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00095         e.name = "2";
00096         e.quantification = 20.0f;
00097         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00098         e.name = "3";
00099         e.quantification = 30.0f;
00100         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00101         e.name = "4";
00102         e.quantification = 40.0f;
00103         writer->WriteEntry(e);
00104 
00105         delete writer;
00106 }

00111 
00112 void DataSetHeaderUpdaterTest::testUpdateQDFile()
00113 {
00114         CreateReferenceQDFile();
00115 
00116         CHPQuantificationDetectionData data;
00117         CHPQuantificationDetectionFileReader reader;
00118         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(TEST_FILE));
00119         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00120     DataSetHeader hdr = data.GetDataSetHeader();
00121     data.Clear();
00122 
00123         std::ofstream os;
00124         os.open(TEST_FILE, std::ios::out|std::ios::binary|std::ios::in);
00125     DataSetHeaderUpdater upd(os, hdr);
00126     
00127     ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00128     nvt.SetName(L"affymetrix-dataset-md5");
00129     nvt.SetValueAscii("abc", 128);
00130     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(upd.UpdateParameter(nvt) == true);
00131     nvt.SetName(L"other-param");
00132     nvt.SetValueAscii("xyz", 128);
00133     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(upd.UpdateParameter(nvt) == true);
00134     os.close();
00135 
00136 
00137     nvt.SetName(L"");
00138     nvt.SetValueAscii("");
00139 
00140         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00141     hdr = data.GetDataSetHeader();
00142     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(hdr.FindNameValParam(L"other-param", nvt) == true);
00143     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetValueAscii() == "xyz");
00144     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(hdr.FindNameValParam(L"affymetrix-dataset-md5", nvt) == true);
00145     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetValueAscii() == "abc");
00146 
00147 
00148 }
00149 
00150 void DataSetHeaderUpdaterTest::testUpdateQFile()
00151 {
00152         CreateReferenceQFile();
00153 
00154         CHPQuantificationData data;
00155         CHPQuantificationFileReader reader;
00156         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename(TEST_FILE));
00157         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00158     DataSetHeader hdr = data.GetDataSetHeader();
00159     data.Clear();
00160 
00161         std::ofstream os;
00162         os.open(TEST_FILE, std::ios::out|std::ios::binary|std::ios::in);
00163     DataSetHeaderUpdater upd(os, hdr);
00164     
00165     ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00166     nvt.SetName(L"affymetrix-dataset-md5");
00167     nvt.SetValueAscii("abc", 128);
00168     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(upd.UpdateParameter(nvt) == true);
00169     nvt.SetName(L"other-param");
00170     nvt.SetValueAscii("xyz", 128);
00171     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(upd.UpdateParameter(nvt) == true);
00172     os.close();
00173 
00174 
00175     nvt.SetName(L"");
00176     nvt.SetValueAscii("");
00177 
00178         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00179     hdr = data.GetDataSetHeader();
00180     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(hdr.FindNameValParam(L"other-param", nvt) == true);
00181     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetValueAscii() == "xyz");
00182     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(hdr.FindNameValParam(L"affymetrix-dataset-md5", nvt) == true);
00183     CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt.GetValueAscii() == "abc");
00184 
00185 
00186 }
